subject.normal: [mod4j-scm] [jira] Created: (MODFORJ-140) Remove setId() method in dto's

headers.subject: [mod4j-scm] [jira] Created: (MODFORJ-140) Remove setId() method in dto's

body.para: Key: MODFORJ-140 URL: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MODFORJ-140 Project: Mod4j: Modeling for Java using Domain Specific Languages Issue Type: Improvement Affects Versions: 1.0.1 Reporter: Johan Vogelzang Assignee: Jos Warmer
The setId() method should be avoided to be used by developers. If needed the id of dto's should be passed through their constructors.
